properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We praise Thee, O God For the Son of Thy love For Jesus who died And is now gone above.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Hallelujah! Amen. Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Revive us again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We praise Thee, O God For Thy Spirit of light Who hath shone us our Savior And scattered our night.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Hallelujah! Amen. Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Revive us again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All glory and praise To the Lamb that was slain Who hath borne all our sins And hath cleansed every stain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Hallelujah! Amen. Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Revive us again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All glory and praise To the God of all grace, Who has bought us and sought us, And guided our ways.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Hallelujah! Amen. Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Revive us again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive us again Fill each heart with Thy love May each soul be rekindled With fire from above. 10. Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Hallelujah! Amen. Hallelujah! Thine the glory. Revive us again.{/lang-eng}
